reviews.text: The main feature of Bradford Interchange, above all else is that the buses run on time, traffic permitting. Try Burnley bus station, the drivers come wandering out when their buses should be leaving the bus station.

Kind staff, busy environment and easy information to help your travel. I love the view on the train station from the rails weather it’s light or dark the trains coming through the rails on the train it’s nice just looking outside with your headphones on
Fantastic service i really like it

Seriously rough it is 6:15 today and the man stood next to me on platform 3 is high as a kite and openly smoking a joint. The smell is so strong I almost feel high myself! Would not recommend travelling through here!

Why have shops in the bus station interchange when mostly they are shut?? Most of the staff working in these shops are slow and completely useless!! Needs to speed up and have the shop open at all times!!
